author: cdamioli
msg: COCOON-2330 Release separate source and dependencies packages

author: chug
msg: QPID-4575 Visual Studio 2012 - Add VS2012 to cmake shell script.
* This patch trivially adds VS2012 to the version pulldown and passes the right args to CMake.
* CMake now gets a Boost_COMPILER value to allow older (2.8.6) versions of CMake to find boost. This is probably not necessary with newer CMake.

author: chug
msg: QPID-4575: Visual Studio 2012 - Update boost version list to latest release.
